data.actual_result: It still suggests you to join via Desktop app
data.expected_result: It should not show "Join via Desktop app" anymore because it no longer makes sense once the party has ended
data.short_description: You are suggested to join via Desktop app a Spotify listen along invite that has ended
data.steps_to_repro: - Have someone send an invite to listen along on Spotify  - Have him end the session so it shows "Listenning party is over"
